paramagpy.metal.Metal.rads¶

Metal.rads(position)[source]¶

Calculate the residual anisotropic dipolar shift at the given postition.

The partial alignment induced by an anisotropic magnetic susecptiblity causes the dipole shift tensor at a nuclear position to average to a value different to the PCS.

Parameters

position (array floats) – the position (x, y, z) in meters

Returns

rads – the residual anisotropic dipole shift in parts-per-million (ppm)

Return type

float

Next topic
